mainBanner.subtitleBanner: We are building the sport's future.

contactCard.descContact: We remain at your disposal for any questions via email to renardanalytics@gmail.com or through any of our social networks.

carouselMain.descriptionCarousel: We integrate data from different sources quickly and efficiently using the latest data engineering techniques.
carouselMain.descriptionCarousel1: We analyze quantitative and qualitative data to provide complete reports for sports decision making, regarding strategies, preparation, training and more.
carouselMain.descriptionCarousel2: We provide a complete and exhaustive search for players based on specific characteristics, performance, future projection, similarity and more.
carouselMain.descriptionCarousel3: We advise on the implementation of new technologies for sports, guiding the process and ensuring that your investment has the best possible return.

work.subtitle: Work in progress
work.title: An experienced team, together since 2021.
work.description: We are a team of experienced data analysts and engineers. We only joined recently, but we've already achieved a lot.

experience.subtitle: Our experience
experience.title: A team of experienced professionals.
experience.description: We have a team of experienced engineers up to date with a wide range of technologies.

contactUs.subtitle: Contact us
contactUs.title: All your inquiries are welcome!
contactUs.description: We are at your disposal for any questions via email or through any of our social networks.

aboutRenard.subtitle: ABOUT RENARD
aboutRenard.title: Sports Big Data at your fingertips
aboutRenard.description: We are a team of engineers from Argentina and Ecuador. We joined with the mission of bringing world-class data analysis technologies to sports clubs in Latin America so that they can maximize their potential.

ourVision.subtitle: OUR VISION
ourVision.title: To be a regional benchmark in the field of sports big data.
ourVision.description: Sports big data is already a reality in many countries. We want to be a benchmark in bringing the latest technologies in sports to the clubs of the region so that they can compete globally.

ourValues.subtitle: OUR VALUES
ourValues.title: They guide our day to day.
ourValues.description: At renard we believe in these principles, and we work daily to be able to comply with them.
ourValues.card1desc: We believe that success lies in thoroughly understanding the needs of our clients, which is why we work together to find the right solution with the best return on investment.
ourValues.card2desc: We believe that our growth goes hand in hand with that of our clients, we help them to develop while constantly learning from them.
ourValues.card3desc: Because any reliable and lasting relationship is based on trust, we pride ourselves on being an internally and externally transparent company.
ourValues.card4desc: Technology advances day by day, and so do we. We work continuously to stay abreast of the latest tools available.
ourValues.card5desc: A quality product is achieved by taking the correct actions from day one, which is why following good practices in our work is key for us.
ourValues.card6desc: The above can only be accomplished through collaboration and ongoing communication. Our clients are an essential part of this and we want them to be part of our work team.
